Choose one –
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Gain control of target artifact until the end of your next turn.
• Discover 2. [i](Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 2 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
